comments:

Are there more errors in the log file? Could you attach the log so I can have a look?

There were other things in the log, but they appeared unrelated, e.g. conflicts in keybindings etc.

I have since deleted the log.  However, since I can make the NPE happen on demand, I just tried it again to give you a log file and all that gets logged is an exception like the one I pasted above.   One exception per attempt.
Also, could you attach a patch of the changes to the file in question. That may help us reproduce the problem.

By any chance, does a restart fix the problem (I'm looking at the code and found something suspicious that a restart may fix)? If it doesn't please check the log to see if there is another exception (i.e. this looks like a duplicate of bug 177831 except you are only seeing one of the exceptions).
A restart did fix the problem.  Thanks.
I've put in a fix for the recurring exception. The original problem, as outlined in bug 177831 still remains unsolved.
